DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy safety enoxaparin compare unfractionated heparin ( UFH ) patient diagnose Acute Coronary Syndrome ( ACS ) emergency department ( ED ) . Efficacy assess use composite score consist 30-day all-cause mortality , non-fatal myocardial infarction ( MI ) recurrent angina require revascularization .
DOC.brief_title: Enoxaparin Versus Unfractionated Heparin Subjects Who Present Emergency Department With Acute Coronary Syndrome ( RESCUE )
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA Rest angina last least 10 minute highly suggestive myocardial ischemia explain trauma obvious abnormality chest xray , occur within 24 hour randomization ; TIMI risk score great equal 4 ( qualitative test CKMB Troponin may utilize screening purpose ; however , quantitative test must still perform . ) EXCLUSION CRITERIA Increased bleed risk define follow : Ischemic stroke within last year Any previous hemorrhagic stroke , intracranial tumor , intracranial aneurysm Recent ( < 1 month ) trauma major surgery ( include bypass surgery ) Active bleed ( minor skin abrasion ) Impaired hemostasis include one following : Known International Normalized Ratio ( INR ) > 1.5 Past present bleeding disorder ( include congenital bleeding disorder von Willebrand 's disease hemophilia , acquire bleeding disorder , unexplained clinically significant bleed disorder ) Known history thrombocytopenia ( platelet count < 100,000/mL ) History thrombocytopenia glycoprotein IIb/IIIa inhibitor therapy , heparin , enoxaparin Angina secondary cause : severe , uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 180 mm Hg despite treatment ) anemia valvular disease congenital heart disease hypertrophic cardiomyopathy restrictive constrictive cardiomyopathy thyrotoxicosis . Bundle branch block know old context angina . Undergone percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) within past 24 hour . A known allergy heparin , low molecular weight heparin , pork pork product . Any contraindication treatment UFH LMWH . A recent ( < 48 hour ) plan spinal/epidural anesthesia puncture . Thrombolytic therapy within precede 24 hour . Any clinically relevant serious disease , include severe liver disease renal failure [ creatinine clearance < 30 mL/min ] , render implementation protocol interpretation study result difficult . Treatment investigational agent device within previous 30 day , plan use investigational drug device , previously enrol trial . Inability comply protocol ( e.g. , uncooperative attitude , inability return followup visit ) . Inability understand nature , scope , possible consequence study otherwise unable provide inform consent . A prosthetic heart valve
